items.name: core.foundation
items.notes: Basic app/runtime primitives, env, logging hooks, etc.

items.name: core.storage
items.notes: Overall storage behavior across modules.

items.name: core.storage
items.notes: StoragePaths, atomic write services, manifests; implementation aligned with specs.

items.name: core.auth
items.notes: Auth flows and UX.

items.name: core.auth
items.notes: Auth engine, session management, identity.

items.name: core.permissions
items.notes: Roles, overrides, UX & behavior.

items.name: core.permissions
items.notes: Permission model, policy registry, service, guards.

items.name: core.ui
items.notes: App shell, navigation, workspace experience.

items.name: core.ui
items.notes: UI state, router, layout, error boundaries, project selector.

items.name: core.runtime
items.notes: Module lifetime, hooks, job scheduling, diagnostics integration.

items.name: core.moduleStateRepository
items.notes: Versioned module-state storage with atomic writes & schemaVersion rules.

items.name: core.accessControl
items.notes: Authentication, sessions, PermissionContext, rolesâ†’permissions mapping.

items.name: feature.map
items.notes: Block specced; FeatureMapTypes + read-only FeatureMapService implemented; active map, calibration, viewport, imagery services planned.

items.name: feature.map
items.notes: Map registry read-only slice implemented; active map/calibration/imagery services not yet implemented.

items.name: feature.sketch
items.notes: Sketching tools UI & interactions.

items.name: feature.sketch
items.notes: Sketch data model & persistence.

items.name: feature.files
items.notes: File browser UX, upload, links; backend MVP implements file upload/delete using FILE_READ/FILE_WRITE via core.permissions and a membership-aware PermissionContext.

items.name: feature.files
items.notes: File metadata and storage integration; backend MVP implements file upload/delete using FILE_READ/FILE_WRITE via core.permissions.

items.name: feature.comments
items.notes: Comment UI and activity surfaces; MVP focuses on basic create/delete flows.

items.name: feature.comments
items.notes: Comment persistence and permissions; backend MVP implements create/delete using COMMENT_* actions via core.permissions with a membership-aware PermissionContext.

items.name: feature.measure
items.notes: Measurement tools on maps/sketches.

items.name: feature.measure
items.notes: Measurement math, snapping, tolerances.

items.name: core.exportImport
items.notes: Project export/import services; project.db (including project_members) is preserved on import. Export/import permission errors follow the canonical PERMISSION_DENIED AppError shape.

items.name: debug.projectOverview
items.notes: Dev/debug-only project overview aggregation module; read-only, permission-respecting views over project-level feature data (maps, files, comments).

items.name: core.ux.shell
items.notes: Runtime configuration shell, deployment lifecycle, and mode management.

items.name: core.ux.shell.ShellConfigGovernance
items.notes: Rules for what constitutes a valid configuration.

items.name: core.ux.shell.ShellConfigStorage
items.notes: Atomic file system operations for config management.

items.name: core.ux.shell.ShellConfigValidation
items.notes: Schema validation and severity classification (A1/A2/B).

items.name: core.ux.shell.ShellConfigDeployAndRollback
items.notes: Orchestration of deploy/rollback actions.

items.name: core.ux.shell.ModesAdvancedDeveloper
items.notes: Developer-specific features and overrides.

items.notes: Fail-safe behavioral definitions.
